item.title: Careers
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1494424995336{margin-bottom: 69px !important;padding-top: 13px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][advice_heading tag="h3" title="A career that fits your calling" css=".vc_custom_1494424844792{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][advice_text_block font_size="18px" line_height="1.89" css=".vc_custom_1494424982933{margin-bottom: 34px !important;}"]Problem solvers and creative thinkers. Engineers and new business builders. Put your talents to use where opportunities are limitless and every day makes a difference.[/advice_text_block][advice_text_block font_size="18px" line_height="1.89"]Whether you’re an experienced professional or a recent graduate, working with Advice could be a challenging and rewarding next step in your career.[/advice_text_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][advice_space landscape_mobile_space="35" mobile_space="35"][advice_video alignment="right" youtube_id="M7lc1UVf-VE" video_w="470" card_img_id="1373" css=".vc_custom_1499792671180{padding-top: 8px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1494567505714{margin-bottom: 57px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator css=".vc_custom_1494424966516{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][advice_heading tag="h2" text_align="center" title="Our vacancies" css=".vc_custom_1494567531621{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][advice_jobs number_items="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
